title: Dark Shard
summaries: The Dark Shard is a Hardmode crafting material used in the crafting of the Dao of Pow and the Onyx Blaster. It has a 10*1/10 (10%) chance of being dropped by Dark Mummies and Shadow Mummies in Corrupt Deserts, and Blood Mummies in Crimson Deserts.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, they also have a 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) chance to drop from Tainted/Vile Ghouls which respectively spawn within the Crimson/Corrupted Underground Desert, and a 4*1/25 (4%) chance of dropping from Bone Biters and Flesh Reavers.
The Hallow counterpart is the <linked>Light Shard</linked>.
